remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別的代表單一作業，這通常是傳回值，並以非同步方式執行。The class represents a single operation that returns a value and that usually executes asynchronously. 物件是其中一個的中央元件[工作架構非同步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md)首度引進.NET Framework 4 中。 objects are one of the central components of the [task-based asynchronous pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md) first introduced in the .NET Framework 4. 因為工作所執行物件通常是以非同步方式執行的執行緒集區執行緒上而不是以同步方式主應用程式執行緒，您可以使用屬性，並將， ，和屬性，以判斷工作的狀態。Because the work performed by a object typically executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread rather than synchronously on the main application thread, you can use the property, as well as the , , and properties, to determine the state of a task. 大多數情況下，lambda 運算式用來指定的工作是將執行的工作。Most commonly, a lambda expression is used to specify the work that the task is to perform. 可能在各種不同的方式建立執行個體。 instances may be created in a variety of ways. 最常見的方法，從開始提供[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，是呼叫靜態或方法。The most common approach, which is available starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 這些方法會提供簡單的方式來啟動工作是使用預設值，而不取得額外的參數。These methods provide a simple way to start a task by using default values and without acquiring additional parameters. 下列範例會使用方法啟動的工作，執行迴圈，並接著會顯示迴圈反覆項目數目：The following example uses the method to start a task that loops and then displays the number of loop iterations: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/run1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/run1.vb#6)] 或者，以及最常見的方式來啟動工作以[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，是呼叫靜態或方法。An alternative, and the most common way to start a task in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 屬性會傳回物件，而屬性會傳回物件。The property returns a object, and the property returns a object. 多載其`StartNew`方法可讓您傳遞引數，定義工作建立選項，並指定工作排程器。Overloads of their `StartNew` method let you pass arguments, define task creation options, and specify a task scheduler. 下列範例會使用方法啟動工作。The following example uses the method to start a task. 它在功能上相當於前一個範例中的程式碼。It is functionally equivalent to the code in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/startnew1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/startnew1.vb#7)] 如需更完整的範例，請參閱[以工作為基礎的非同步程式設計](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md)。For more complete examples, see [Task-based Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md). 類別也會提供建構函式所初始化的工作，但的未排程它執行。The class also provides constructors that initialize the task but that do not schedule it for execution. 基於效能考量，和`Task.Factory.StartNew`方法是建立和排定計算的工作的慣用的機制，但是其中必須以建立工作和排程的情況下，可能會使用建構函式，而工作的方法可能會再用來排定在稍後執行此工作。For performance reasons, the and `Task.Factory.StartNew` methods are the preferred mechanisms for creating and scheduling computational tasks, but for scenarios where task creation and scheduling must be separated, the constructors may be used, and the task's method may then be used to schedule the task for execution at a later time. 從桌面應用程式開始目標[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，建立與叫用工作之執行緒的文化特性會成為在執行緒內容的一部分。Starting with desktop apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the thread that creates and invokes a task becomes part of the thread's context. 也就是工作的工作所執行之執行緒的目前文化特性，不論目前的文化特性是工作的呼叫執行緒的文化特性。That is, regardless of the current culture of the thread on which the task executes, the current culture of the task is the culture of the calling thread. 之前的.NET Framework 版本為目標的應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，工作的文化特性為工作所執行之執行緒的文化特性。For apps that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the task is the culture of the thread on which the task executes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 < 文化特性和以工作為基礎的非同步作業 」 一節主題。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. 請注意，市集應用程式遵循 Windows 執行階段中設定和取得的預設文化特性。Note that Store apps follow the Windows Runtime in setting and getting the default culture. 不會傳回值的作業，您使用類別。For operations that do not return a value, you use the class. 如果您正在開發更輕量工作是實值類型，而不是參考類型，使用 C# 7，使用結構; 它支援 C# 7。If you're developing with C# 7, for a more lightweight task that is a value type rather than a reference type, use the structure; it is supported starting with C# 7.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是呼叫這個建構函式，最常見的方式，來具現化物件和啟動工作是藉由呼叫靜態和方法。Rather than calling this constructor, the most common way to instantiate a object and launch a task is by calling the static and methods. 這個建構函式所提供的唯一優點是它可讓物件具現化，分隔從工作引動過程。The only advantage offered by this constructor is that it allows object instantiation to be separated from task invocation. ## Examples 下列範例會計算文字在文字檔案，代表已發行活頁簿中的近似數目。The following example counts the approximate number of words in text files that represent published books. 每項工作負責開啟檔案，以非同步的方式，讀取其完整內容，而且使用規則運算式的計算字數統計。Each task is responsible for opening a file, reading its entire contents asynchronously, and calculating the word count by using a regular expression. 呼叫方法，請確定所有工作已都完成之後，主控台中顯示每本書的字數。The method is called to ensure that all tasks have completed before displaying the word count of each book to the console. 物件具現化會與在此範例中的物件執行分開，如此範例可確保每個檔案存在。Object instantiation is separated from object execution in this example so that the example can ensure that each file exists. 如果沒有，它會顯示遺漏之檔案的名稱。If they do not, it displays the name of the missing file. 否則，它會呼叫啟動每項工作的方法。Otherwise, it calls the method to launch each task. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/cs/run3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/vb/run3.vb#2)] 規則運算式模式`\p{P}*\s+`比對零個、 一個或多個標點符號字元後面接著一個或多個空格字元。The regular expression pattern `\p{P}*\s+` matches zero, one, or more punctuation characters followed by one or more whitespace characters. 它會假設的相符項目總數等於大約字數。It assumes that the total number of matches equals the approximate word count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不進行執行排程目前的工作完成為止，是否完成，因為成功執行到完成為止，判定為失敗，因為發生未處理的例外狀況，或因取消提早結束。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用 Sieve Eratosthenes 計算介於 1 到由使用者所輸入的值之間的質數前項工作。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 陣列用來保存質數的相關資訊。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 陣列索引代表數字，以及項目的值會指出該數字是複合 (其值是`true`) 或質數 (其值是`false`)。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 這項工作接著會傳遞給接續工作，也就是負責質數擷取整數陣列，並顯示它們。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不進行執行排程目前的工作完成為止，是否因為成功執行到完成為止，判定為失敗，因為發生未處理的例外狀況，或因取消提早結束時完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立的工作，會傳遞介於 2 到 20 之間的整數，並傳回陣列，包含前十個指數 (n1 n10) 該數字。The following example creates a task that is passed an integer between 2 and 20 and returns an array that contains the first ten exponents (from n1 to n10) of that number. 接續工作是則負責顯示指數。A continuation task is then responsible for displaying the exponents. 它會傳遞前項和原始的編號前項所產生的指數。It is passed both the antecedent and the original number whose exponents the antecedent generates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回將不進行執行排程目前的工作完成為止，是否因為成功執行到完成為止，判定為失敗，因為發生未處理的例外狀況，或因取消提早結束時完成。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用 Sieve Eratosthenes 計算介於 1 到由使用者所輸入的值之間的質數前項工作。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 陣列用來保存質數的相關資訊。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 陣列索引代表數字，以及項目的值會指出該數字是複合 (其值是`true`) 或質數 (其值是`false`)。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 這項工作接著會傳遞給接續工作，也就是負責質數擷取整數陣列，並顯示它們。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. 取消語彙基元傳遞至前項和接續工作。A cancellation token is passed to both the antecedent and the continuation task. A物件用來定義 100 毫秒的逾時值。A object is used to define a timeout value of 100 milliseconds. 事件引發時，如果呼叫方法時，以及取消語彙基元可用來要求取消的工作。If the event fires, the method is called, and the cancellation token is used to request cancellation of the tasks. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continue1.vb#1)] 一般而言，提供關於 100000 的值會導致逾時間隔過期而引發的事件以及取消要求設定。Typically, supplying a value of about 100,000 causes the timeout interval to expire and the event to fire, and the cancellation request to be set.

span.span: A factory object that can create a variety of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回預設執行個體等同於呼叫的無參數所建立的類別建構函式。This property returns a default instance of the class that is identical to the one created by calling the parameterless constructor. 它有下列屬性值：It has the following property values: |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`或 `null`, or | 這個屬性的最常見用法是以建立並啟動新工作的單一呼叫中方法。The most common use of this property is to create and start a new task in a single call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、方法提供最簡單的方式建立使用預設組態值的物件。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a object with default configuration values. 下列範例會使用靜態屬性使三次呼叫方法。The following example uses the static property to make three calls to the method. 在第一個啟動`Task`物件，它會執行，則傳回 1 的 lambda 運算式。The first starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that returns 1. 在第二個啟動`Task`物件，它會執行具現化新的 lambda 運算式`Test`執行個體。The second starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that instantiates a new `Test` instance. 在第三個啟動`Task`物件，其中會列舉 C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ 目錄中的檔案。The third starts a `Task` object, which enumerates the files in the C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ directory. （請注意，成功執行此範例需要的目錄存在，而且它包含的檔案。(Note that successful execution of the example requires that the directory exist and that it contain files. [!code-csharp[TPL#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl/cs/returnavalue10.cs#10)] [!code-vb[TPL#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl/vb/10_returnavalue.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取屬性的 get 存取子封鎖呼叫執行緒，直到非同步作業已完成。它相當於呼叫方法。Accessing the property's get accessor blocks the calling thread until the asynchronous operation is complete; it is equivalent to calling the method. 一旦可以使用作業的結果，它已儲存，而且在後續呼叫會立即傳回屬性。Once the result of an operation is available, it is stored and is returned immediately on subsequent calls to the property. 請注意，如果工作的作業期間發生例外狀況，或已取消工作，屬性不會傳回值。Note that, if an exception occurred during the operation of the task, or if the task has been cancelled, the property does not return a value. 相反地，嘗試存取的屬性值會擲回例外狀況。Instead, attempting to access the property value throws an exception. ## Examples 下列範例會計算每個名稱會當做命令列引數傳遞的目錄中的檔案中的位元組數的命令列公用程式。The following example is a command-line utility that calculates the number of bytes in the files in each directory whose name is passed as a command-line argument. 如果目錄中包含的檔案，它會執行具現化的 lambda 運算式每個檔案的目錄中的物件，擷取的值和其屬性。If the directory contains files, it executes a lambda expression that instantiates a object for each file in the directory and retrieves the value of its property. 如果目錄不包含任何檔案，則只會呼叫方法來建立工作的屬性為零 (0)。If a directory contains no files, it simply calls the method to create a task whose property is zero (0). 在工作完成時，所有的目錄檔案中的位元組總數可用時，從屬性。When the tasks finish, the total number of bytes in all a directory's files is available from the property. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromResult#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.fromresult/cs/fromresult1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.FromResult#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.fromresult/vb/fromresult1.vb#1)]
